channel.title: My dark bows give melee were i put the useBow = true; code? 'rich read
channel.description:
ok so my darkbow gives xp for attack defence and streagth i heard if u put the code
useBow = true;
it will give range xp but mess up its special i also herd that if you put it in the right place the special wont be messed up
so were do i put the code (even if special will be messed up) but if it wont ill be happyer
thank you

f (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (15156)) {
if (actionTimer == 0) // dark bow

actionTimer = 8;
hitDiff = 4 + misc.random(20);
}
